newsletters.title: The Big 🎃 Pickup delivery event is here! 🚚
newsletters.description:
Help deliver Halloween Supplies, Giant Candy Bars and Spider Candles across Europe! Pick up your cargo at the pumpkin farm on Simulation 1, Simulation 2, or the Arcade server. 🕷️ 

The event runs from October 12th until November 2nd. You will need to complete 5 deliveries to earn a special profile achievement! 🏅

To check out your and the community's progress, you can visit our The Big Pumpkin Pickup delivery tracker: https://truckersmp.com/events/delivery

👉 Find out more about the event: https://truckersmp.com/blog/332
🗣️ Talk about the event: ⁠halloween-events

Happy delivering! 👻
newsletters.author: sakthi

newsletters.title: Tamil Pasanaga VTC October 2025 Public convoy.
newsletters.description:
Tamil Pasanaga VTC October 2025 Public convoy. 🚛
We are pleased to announce that our community will be hosting a convoy this October, and we warmly invite fellow VTC members to join us for this exciting event. Your participation will not only enhance the experience but also help us create lasting memories together.
Let’s ride united and make this convoy a truly unforgettable one.
Event Overview:
📅Date: 25th October 2025
🕘Meetup Time: 07:30 PM IST | 02:00 PM UTC
🕤Departure Time: 08:30 PM IST | 03:00 PM UTC
📍Route: Calais to Mannheim
🚛Departure Location: Calais (Slots)
🚛Destination: Mannheim (Stein Bruch)
🗺Distance: 908 KM
🚘DLC Required: None
📡Server: Event Server
🗒Rules: TMP Guidelines apply.
If you plan to participate, kindly mark your VTC’s presence on the official event page to help us coordinate effectively and ensure a smooth experience for all attendees.
For Slot Booking: Click Here
For our Smooth Operation of our convoy this Event is Supervised by Drive Along
newsletters.author: Event Team

newsletters.author: sakthi

newsletters.title: Promods 2.76
newsletters.description:
- Bulgaria: Благоевград (Blagoevgrad) (returned) - France: Free-flow tolls on A13 - Germany: BAB100 bridge removed, BAB9 improved - Gibraltar: Gibraltar - Latvia: Balvi (expanded) - Moldova: M5 & R30 Chișinău - Palanca added - Romania: DN10 Buzău - Brașov added - Serbia: Belgrade bypass - Turkey: Keşan (rebuilt) - Ukraine: Ізмаїл (Izmail), Одеса (Odesa), M15 added - Fuel stations updated in Estonia and Latvia - Added various ferries across the Black Sea - Special Transport routes fixes

Requires DLC :

EAST, NORTH, FRANCE, ITALY, BALTIC, BL_SEA, IBERIA, BALKAN, GREECE
newsletters.author: Sakthi
